home.title: Neocratia
home.main_heading: Let’s upgrade the way our laws are created

subheading.line1: We are tired of corruption, big money influencing our laws, and stupid political discourse. Democracy must be honest and efficient, but the system is broken
subheading.line2: Neocratia’s goal is to upgrade the way our laws are created
